==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a bed or stretcher for the sick.

While graphically appears to be {{Han compound|冫|广}}, this is not the etymology. See [[病]], [[疲]] for common characters incorporating this radical.
